name: The Tower (itch) (communistsister)
description:
THE TOWER

a game made for Gothic Novel Jam, 2018

-

Content Warning:

Some readers may find elements of this story disturbing.
Please take particular caution if you are sensitive to any of the following:
Harsh language
Internalised transphobia
Anxiety over infertility
Medical Procedures
Blurring of reality and fiction
Abduction

-

Controls:

This is a mostly keyboard-playable twine game. Where you see a ~, you can press Spacebar to advance, or use the mouse.

In some sections you will be able to play a sub-game. The controls here are the arrow keys to move; however, due to technical issues, this will not be automatically selected, and you will need to click on the game to activate it, then click on the link to the next passage when done. Players unable to use a mouse can skip the passage by pressing the Spacebar as normal.
